game.title: The Lost Relic
game.objective: Find the lost relic of Azura
game.description: The ancient and valuable relic of Azura has been stolen. Your task is to find it and bring it back.
game.reward: 5000 gold coins and a rare artifact

tasks.description: You will need to reach the fortress of shadows where it is believed the relic is kept.
Defeat the shadow guards protecting the relic.
Find and Retrieve the lost relic of Azura.
tasks.location: Inner sanctum of the Fortress of Shadows
